lastCommitMessage: refactor: improve image handling in product form
- Enhanced the image management logic by calculating the total number of valid images, including existing and newly added images.
- Updated the image removal method to accept image URLs instead of indices, simplifying the removal process.
- Improved user feedback by maintaining the snackbar notification for image removal, ensuring a better user experience.
These changes aim to streamline image handling in the product form and enhance overall code readability.
